TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationQueuingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationQueuingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationQueuingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为标记的程序集启用队列支持，并启用应用程序从“消息队列”队列读取方法调用。

span.span: Enables queuing support for the marked assembly and enables the application to read method calls from Message Queuing queues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用队列支持。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether queuing support is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用队列支持，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if queuing support is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 构造函数设置的默认值是 。

span.span: The default value set by the constructor is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序不能为默认情况下使用排队的组件。Applications are not able to use queued components by default. 实例化可让应用程序使用排队组件; 但是，不会启用应用程序以侦听来自客户端的排队消息。Instantiating enables an application to use queued components; however, it does not enable the application to listen for queued messages from clients. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值`ApplicationQueuing`特性的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of an `ApplicationQueuing` attribute's property. [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute/VB/class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxListenerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于从队列提取消息并激活相应组件的线程的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of threads used to extract messages from the queue and activate the corresponding component.

value.span: 用于处理到达队列中的消息的线程的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of threads to use for processing messages arriving in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的有效范围为 0 到 1000年。The valid range for this property is 0 to 1000. 默认值为零。The default is zero. 对于新创建的应用程序，设置派生自当前用于确定默认侦听器线程数的算法： 16 倍的 Cpu 数服务器中。For a newly created application, the setting is derived from the algorithm currently used for determining the default number of listener threads: 16 times the number of CPUs in the server. 有关详细信息，请参阅`QcListenerMaxThreads`中[应用程序 （COM +）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/c0c46592-5282-412d-8f54-67637be8218a.asp)。For more information, see `QcListenerMaxThreads` in [Applications (COM+)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/c0c46592-5282-412d-8f54-67637be8218a.asp). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的值`ApplicationQueuing`特性的属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of an `ApplicationQueuing` attribute's property.
